letters.author: Albert Camus (albert.camus@existentialdread.com)
letters.letter:
You come into the world alone. 

You fill out a few web forms. 

And then you die, also alone.

letters.author: Maya Angelou (maya@angelou.com)
letters.letter: I know you were a product of the culture and time into which you were born. But still... I can't help but think you probably genuinely had some deeply problematic ideas about race.
